doc.name: DummyDisplay
doc.description:
Class comments

A DummyDisplay is a simple sink implementing the BufferingProfile interface. It is used for testing the OptimizingSDFDirector.

See ptolemy.domains.sdf.optimize.OptimizingSDFDirector, ptolemy.domains.sdf.optimize.OptimizingSDFScheduler and ptolemy.domains.sdf.optimize.BufferingProfile for more information.
doc.author: Marc Geilen
